description: Haunted by what could go wrong without the system, and reliving warnings from the bartender about violence in a power vacuum, Oksana models collapse in key sectors and prepares drastic recommendations.
Her urgent report calls for immediate BCI reset, supporting forceful action to prevent chaos, even as she admits the costs might be high.
Directorate seizes control on Oksana’s warning, restoring BCI enforcement, detaining protest leaders, and deploying severe new compliance protocols.
